props.text: Note:  This value in the fields in this column should begin with a period (.)
Note:  The value in this field should match the configured Kafka stream tag in Flex.  These tags will be created when the _createKafkaTags method is triggered.
Disable Unused OPC / Device Tags based on the Asset's Features

config.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger("Update Tree Items")
	newBranches = []
	parameters = StandardUDT.utils.getUDTParameters(self.session.custom.AssetPath)
	opcServerName = StandardUDT.utils.extractParameterValue(parameters['opc_serverName'])
	opcPath = StandardUDT.utils.extractParameterValue(parameters['opc_serverTopic'])
	opcNode = StandardUDT.utils.extractParameterValue(parameters['opc_serverNode'])
	logger.info ('opcPath: '+opcPath + opcNode)
	if opcNode != '':
		newBranches = StandardUDT.utils.buildTree(opcServerName,opcPath + opcNode)
	else:
		newBranches = StandardUDT.utils.buildTree(opcServerName,opcPath)
	logger.info(str(newBranches))
	self.session.custom.opcItems = newBranches
	self.view.custom.opcServerName = opcServerName
